testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name 'ahmed' and last name 'hussein'...................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email 'test@example.com' field...............................passed And user enter password and confirmation password...........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed with green background.....................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "ahmedmohamed660000@gmail.com" and "123456"............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed
